citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15pm on 27-
SEPT-21. Left voice message at listed contact number and spoke with family member who indicated licensee would not
be available to facilitate an unannounced inspection.
End Section
